summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a meeting and some financial information. The email contains confidential information and emphasizes the attorney-client privilege. It also mentions board members and a change in financial stakes.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a meeting and financial details.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, involved in discussions with Epstein regarding board matters.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating regarding board matters, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email discusses a meeting involving board members and financial stakes.
Epstein mentions a change in financial stakes from 45-55 to 70-30.
The email emphasizes confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege.
There are references to other individuals, but their names are not fully disclosed.
The communication is marked as confidential and includes disclaimers about its content.
